attributes.action: Resign and call a General Election, as he and the Government has lost the confidence of the electorate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown's response to helping those who are hardest hit by high utility/food bills is a public disgrace. His failure to impose a windfall tax on greedy utility/oil companies is a kick in the face for the long suffering general public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
